title: Hive Coordination System - Fault Tolerance Assessment

overview.testScope: Fault Tolerance, Redundancy, Emergency Response, Adaptive Scaling

keyFindings: Good system resilience with opportunities for improvement
2 critical fault tolerance issues require immediate attention

riskAssessment.description: Critical component failures detected in fault tolerance mechanisms

executiveRecommendations: Strengthen fault tolerance mechanisms before staging deployment
Focus on improving recovery times and redundancy mechanisms
